categories.name: Transform 2 Spans, Return Error Information
categories.description: Attempting to measure how the form of a function (pointers vs. sizes) changes affects repetitive use.

data_groups.name: err(T**, size_t*, T**, size_t*)
data_groups.description: An indivisible unit conversion using output pointers for the data and its size.

data_groups.name: err(T**, T*, T**, T*)
data_groups.description: An indivisible unit conversion using output pointers for the data and its size and returning an error code.

data_groups.name: { err, ptr, size }(T*, T*, T*, T*)
data_groups.description: An indivisible unit conversion returning a structure which contains the error code with a pointer/size pair representing input and output, and the function input takes a list of pointers representing the beginning and end of the input and output spans.

data_groups.name: { err, ptr, size }(T*, size_t, T*, size_t)
data_groups.description: An indivisible unit conversion returning a structure which contains the error code with a pointer/size pair representing input and output, and the function input takes a two pointer/size pairs representing the input and output spans.

data_groups.name: { err, ptr, ptr }(T*, T*, T*, T*)
data_groups.description: An indivisible unit conversion returning a structure which contains the error code with a pointer/pointer pair representing input and output, and the function input takes a list of pointers representing the beginning and end of the input and output spans.

data_groups.name: { err, ptr, ptr }(T*, size_t, T*, size_t)
data_groups.description: An indivisible unit conversion returning a structure which contains the error code with a pointer/pointer pair representing input and output, and the function input takes a two pointer/size pairs representing the input and output spans.

data_groups.name: memcpy
data_groups.description: Copying the data directly to the output.

data_labels.name: real time
data_labels.description: The amount of elapsed time in the real world; also known as "wall clock" time.

data_labels.name: cpu time
data_labels.description: The amount of elapsed time if work done was laid out in linear time and did not have concurrency, parallelization, or multithreading in use.
